question: Who among the following was President of United States when Cripps Mission visited India?
explanation: The Cripps mission came to India in March 1942. The mission was headed by a Sir Stafford Cripps. The mission was sent to negotiate an agreement with the nationalist Congress leaders. Franklin D. Roosevelt was the President of United States that time. He demanded speedy solution of the problems of India to the then prime minister of United Kingdom Sir Winston Churchill.
